name: sharefeed
description: ShareFeed - Share URLs with family and friends via Holochain

scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:extension && npm run test:ui
scripts.build: npm run build:extension && npm run build:ui && npm run build:happ
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:zomes && npm run pack:dna && npm run pack:happ
scripts.build:zomes: RUSTFLAGS='--cfg getrandom_backend="custom"' cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown -p sharefeed_integrity -p sharefeed
scripts.pack:ui: cd ui && rm -f dist.zip && npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../dist.zip .
scripts.pack:webhapp: npm run pack:ui && npm run pack:happ && hc web-app pack workdir
scripts.network: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && concurrently -k "UI_PORT=1420 npm run -w ui dev" "npm run launch"
scripts.launch:moss: concurrently "npm run -w ui dev" "sleep 1 && weave --agent-idx 1 --dev-config we_dev/config.ts" "sleep 10 && weave --agent-idx 2 --dev-config we_dev/config.ts"
